channel.title: meristem on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in meristem on funPlantGenes

item.title: ACS7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C03G066100 Gene Symbol: ACS7 Gene Name: carboxylate synthase 7 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: An allelic variant in the ACS7 gene promotes primary root growth in watermelon。 The ACS7 expression and ethylene levels in the primary root tips suggested that ethylene is a negative regulator of root elongation in watermelon.

item.title: APO1;OsAPO1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g45460 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0665400 Gene Symbol: APO1 OsAPO1 SCM2 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CaBLIND
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaBLIND|CaBL Gene Name: BLIND Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaBLIND|CaBL regulates axillary meristem initiation and transition to flowering in pepper.

item.title: CaJOINTLESS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaJOINTLESS Gene Name: Cajointless Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaJOINTLESS is a MADS-box gene involved in suppression of vegetative growth in all shoot meristems in pepper.

item.title: CaRAX1;2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaRAX1;2a|SFL Gene Name: SINGLE FLOWER Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: The SINGLE FLOWER (2a|SFL) gene encodes a MYB transcription factor that regulates the number of flowers produced by the inflorescence of chickpea.

item.title: Cg1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM5G838324 Gene Symbol: Cg1 Gene Name: Corngrass1 Genome: B73_RefGen_v3 Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Furthermore, a target of Cg1 is teosinte glume architecture1 (tga1)1, a gene known to have had a role in the domestication of maize from teosinte.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_4G030920;Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Amino Acid Permease 2 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Disruption of the amino acid transporter CsAAP2 inhibits auxin-mediated root development in cucumber.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsAAP2 knockout lines exhibited arrested development of root meristem, which then caused the delayed initiation of lateral root and the inhibition of root elongation.

item.title: CsLFY
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G000050.1 Gene Symbol: CsLFY Gene Name: LEAFY Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsLFY is required for shoot meristem maintenance via interaction with WUSCHEL in cucumber.

item.title: CsTFL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa6G452100 Gene Symbol: CsTFL1 Gene Name: TERMINAL FLOWER1 Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsTFL1 inhibits determinate growth and terminal flower formation through interaction with CsNOT2a in cucumber.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_4g30710 Gene Symbol: FveFT2 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T 2 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: The FveFT2 florigen/FveTFL1 antiflorigen balance is critical for the control of seasonal flowering in strawberry while FveFT3 modulates axillary meristem fate and yield.

item.title: MtNAM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtNAM Gene Name: NO APICAL MERISTEM Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: NO APICAL MERISTEM (MtNAM) regulates floral organ identity and lateral organ separation in Medicago truncatula.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020.1 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.title: MtSERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtSERF1 Gene Name: SOMATIC EMBRYO RELATED FACTOR1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor MtSERF1 of the ERF subfamily identified by transcriptional profiling is required for somatic embryogenesis induced by auxin plus cytokinin in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MtZR1
